snippet.title: Deus Ex - Lay D Denton Project 1.1 Announcement
snippet.description:
Version 1.1 is live. New features include:

-Roughly 30 JC retakes
-Roughly 15 or so missed pronoun edits
-Official LDDP HUD color scheme. 
-Male/Female JC Side-by-side implementation.
-Male/Female Character creation screen.  
-Added LDDP NPC dialogue for Male JC.
-All cut content recorded with fixed pronouns.
-Option for original Morpheus.
-Option for original Mercedes/Tessa/Camille/Mamasan
-Three additional LDDP NPCs.
-Several added AI Barks and out-of-convo lines for select LDDP NPCs

Alongside 1.1, the full release of the source code with detailed documentation!

Discord: https://discord.gg/MdW7KW8jFr
ModDB: https://www.moddb.com/mods/the-lay-d-denton-project
Install Instructions: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Y1IAMjqTGKIvUA9sGTxHCo3ge19c87HK/
Project Guide: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xEcW7iwstbE62lgOxQcl9sMqD_70lbz1/
Detailed Technical Guide: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BJfli7ZL6BN4mPL5GbpTOUSewN1tfzAvzLOCwHp3bcM/

Mods fully compatible with Deus Ex as of the 1.1 release:

Vanilla? Madder: https://www.moddb.com/mods/vanilla-madder-actual-phase-1/
A mod that aims to enrich the roleplaying elements of Deus Ex. It features enhanced appearance customization, skill trees, additional gameplay mechanics, and more.

DXRando: https://github.com/Die4Ever/deus-ex-randomizer#readme
A highly customizable randomizer for Deus Ex with crowd control functionality for streamers.

Credits:
Karen Rohan -- JC Denton, Modified Cover Art and Additional Art Assets
Chris Rohan -- Vocal Director, Additional Characters
Kyle "Mr. Poke" Peach -- Maps & Programming
WCCC -- Additional Programming
Bogie -- Female JC Character Model

Trailer music cover composed by Mairiba and used with permission
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmmOgYY7oX2tWoHPiS4TGOg
